attributes.action: Reduce duty and Vat on bio-fuels, offer tax incentives to bio-diesel users and producers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Due to the duty on bio fuel, manufacturers are finding it difficult to make a profit. This petition is asking the government to remove or substantially reduce the vat and or the duty from such fuel. 

This would increase the number of suppliers (in what is a cottage industry), and make the product available to more of the public.

The benefits are huge; action now could have an immediate effect on pollution. People who need to drive four wheeled drive, or any Bio-fuel powered vehicles should also be given a road fund rebate as an incentive to use these fuels, as their vehicle will then be cleaner than the cleanest mineral fuelled car.

1.	Reduce duty on Bio-Fuel.
2.	Reduce Vat on Bio-Fuel.
3.	Provide a road fund rebate for people who can prove that they use only Bio-Fuels.
4.      Offer incentives to small producers, increased use of bio fuels will help our farmers.

The benefits are huge, for our children.

Dominic M’Benga, York.
